title: Do writers write every day? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most writers whose interviews I have read recommend writing every day. This isn’t because you might lose a lingering thought, but because it is always good to be persistent with what you are good at; in this case, writing. In my case, I ensure that I write something every day. It could be a diary entry, a poem, or a single-line thought that struck me. I have observed that ideas and inspiration often strike when we slow down in our otherwise busy lives.
